overview: In the tenth century of our era, Anaid lived happily with her brother Tulga in a small village. But the black clouds of tragedy loomed over their idyllic life in the village. Transformed into a young and precocious Supreme, Anaid, she will be instructed on the path of Light by a Redeemer Spirit to fight at her side in the timeless struggle against three dark and archaic evil forces known as: Apocalypse, Dominion and Massacre.
tagline: This horror short was originally made to be part of an anthology.
title: Night Prowlers 2
